name: Umbrel v0.3.9
notes:
Umbrel v0.3.9 brings some major stability and performance improvements. The following apps have also been updated to their latest versions:

- Specter Desktop
- Sphinx Relay
- BTC RPC Explorer
- LNbits
- ThunderHub

If you face any difficulties while updating, please message us on Telegram: https://t.me/getumbrel
